body:
Hey Guys,

I was thinking about how much we depend on social media nowadays. Avicus has a few social media sites dedicated to the server, but they are long forgotten and abandoned. So by getting serious on these sites, we can gain publicity and eventually more players.

What I think that we can do is elect certain people to run various social media sites for the server (Instagram, Facebook, G+, Twitter...)
The web is waiting for great things to happen...

-Will

title: [SUG] Get Serious On Social Media

replies.body: We've got a social media team, not sure what they've got up their sleeve...
replies.body_tagged: We've got a social media team, not sure what they've got up their sleeve...

replies.body: They're not doing so good from what I'm seeing.
replies.body_tagged: They're not doing so good from what I'm seeing.

replies.body: As Michael said, we've got a team designated for this but I'm not sure how active they currently are.
replies.body_tagged: As Michael said, we've got a team designated for this but I'm not sure how active they currently are.

replies.body:
I just got from break, and we are currently in the process of inviting community members to join the team.
Check it out here: https://avicus.net/forums/18679bbcb

Also, soon I will be publishing exclusive interviews with the Admins, and if you have questions you want me to ask, PM me on the community slack!
